channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: The RNC will proceed as planned as Republican members of caucus respond to the news
item.description: NPR's Ayesha Rascoe talks with Republican Congressman Mike Lawler of New York about yesterday's assassination attempt at former president Donald Trump's campaign rally.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Ayesha Rascoe talks with Republican Congressman Mike Lawler of New York about yesterday's assassination attempt at former president Donald Trump's campaign rally.
item.dc:creator: Ayesha Rascoe

item.title: The music industry is coming for AI
item.description: A new lawsuit filed by record labels Universal, Sony and Warner says their catalogs have been ripped off by two AI music generators. But there’s a twist: It’s not clear the courts are on their side.
item.content:encoded: A new lawsuit filed by record labels Universal, Sony and Warner says their catalogs have been ripped off by two AI music generators. But there’s a twist: It’s not clear the courts are on their side.
item.dc:creator: Bobby Allyn

item.title: Former President Donald Trump is safe after an assassination attempt at his rally
item.description: The political landscape changed with a shooting at former President Donald Trump's rally in Pennsylvania Saturday evening leaving Americans waking up Sunday with more questions than answers.
item.content:encoded: The political landscape changed with a shooting at former President Donald Trump's rally in Pennsylvania Saturday evening leaving Americans waking up Sunday with more questions than answers.
item.dc:creator: Danielle Kurtzleben

item.title: Butler County, where Trump was holding his rally, is a stronghold for his campaign
item.description: Last night, former President Trump was shot during a rally in Butler, Pa. The area, north of Pittsburgh, is known for it's strong support for Trump.
item.content:encoded: Last night, former President Trump was shot during a rally in Butler, Pa. The area, north of Pittsburgh, is known for it's strong support for Trump.
item.dc:creator: Ayesha Rascoe

item.title: Details are emerging in the assassination attempt on former President Trump
item.description: We'll bring you the latest on the assassination attempt on former president Donald Trump's rally yesterday, in Butler Pennsylvania.
item.content:encoded: We'll bring you the latest on the assassination attempt on former president Donald Trump's rally yesterday, in Butler Pennsylvania.
item.dc:creator: Ayesha Rascoe

item.title: The latest on the assassination attempt on former President Trump
item.description: We'll bring you the latest on the assassination attempt on former president Donald Trump. The incident took place at his campaign rally in Pennsylvania on Saturday.
item.content:encoded: We'll bring you the latest on the assassination attempt on former president Donald Trump. The incident took place at his campaign rally in Pennsylvania on Saturday.
item.dc:creator: Ayesha Rascoe

item.title: Cats on leashes ... yes, it's a thing
item.description: Cat owners in this country are exploring ways to take their feline friends outside safely for walks on leashes, in backpacks and in strollers. (Story first aired on Morning Edition on July 5, 2024.)
item.content:encoded: Cat owners in this country are exploring ways to take their feline friends outside safely for walks on leashes, in backpacks and in strollers. (Story first aired on Morning Edition on July 5, 2024.)
item.dc:creator: Chloe Veltman

item.title: The GOP primary in Utah's largest Congressional district is going for a recall
item.description: The GOP primary in Utah's largest Congressional district is too close to call, with a recount expected. A political newcomer was endorsed by Sen. Mike Lee. The incumbent was backed by Donald Trump.
item.content:encoded: The GOP primary in Utah's largest Congressional district is too close to call, with a recount expected. A political newcomer was endorsed by Sen. Mike Lee. The incumbent was backed by Donald Trump.
item.dc:creator: Saige Miller

item.title: Central Valley, where a quarter of the U.S.'s food is grown, faces extreme heat
item.description: The central valley of California produces a quarter of the nation's food. How are farmworkers dealing with an intense, long-lasting heatwave sweeping the interior of the state?
item.content:encoded: The central valley of California produces a quarter of the nation's food. How are farmworkers dealing with an intense, long-lasting heatwave sweeping the interior of the state?
item.dc:creator: Esther Quintanilla

item.title: Beef production has fallen in recent years because of a years-long drought
item.description: NPR's Ayesha Rascoe speaks with Arizona rancher Mike Gannuscio about why the number of the nation's beef cow herd are at their lowest in 63 years.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Ayesha Rascoe speaks with Arizona rancher Mike Gannuscio about why the number of the nation's beef cow herd are at their lowest in 63 years.
item.dc:creator: Ayesha Rascoe
